Name: Redline
Text: What?!

Name: Redline
Text: University forces have shown up already?!

Name: Redline
Text: Those cowards, only attacking whenever I'm in a real rush... How typical!

Name: Redline
Text: But wait... My Mecha-Equipment has arrived! Ha ha ha!

Name: Redline
Text: Crushing those Universitians will be a piece of cake!

Name: Redline
Text: Push forward troops! This time, Banktania will be victorious!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: The Parking Office is crucial to entering the rest of University.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: This explains the four enemy Mecha-Printers waiting for you.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Let's prioritize our objective. Facing Mecha-Printers will be tough.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Start securing some properties. There are University Buildings nearby.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Capture a property by selecting a Junior or Senior and moving them ontop of the property.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: It will take an infantry two turns to capture a property at full life. Hovering over a property will show how much life it has left.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: A captured property will give you funds each turn.

Name: William
Text: That income can be used to heal, and generates Department Leader power right?

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: That's right. A unit that starts it's turn on a property will heal a bit of life at small cost to your funds. You can also order that unit to remain in the property to fully heal at a premium rate.

Name: William
Text: We'll have to use healing if we want to take on those Mecha-Printers.

Name: William
Text: If we wait until my power fully charges through combat, or with income, I can even have my units hack into them when they attack, disabling them for a turn!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: One more thing, each force has a headquarters. On this map, the parking office is the HQ of Banktania. The HQ is important.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: If you capture the enemy HQ, you will win the mission! That means we also have to make sure to defend ours!

Name: William
Text: Hmmm, Mecha-Printers can't move through mountains and rivers. Maybe there is a way to win without fighting them...
